summary:
Use v1.0 if Anoriath dead.
Anoriath and Lilija can work together with V1.1.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]Lilija[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]I've killed Anoriath for a mission of Dark Brotherhood Quest.[/size]
[size=3]No one at the Anoriath's market stand was boring.[/size]
[size=3]Then I've feel badly about that and I made this Lilija mod.[/size]

[size=3]Now Lilija works at the Anoriath's market stall and you can sell something to her.[/size]

[size=3]She lives in Drunken Huntsman and her working time same as Anoriath.[/size]
[size=3]I've added a new room for her in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.[/size]
[size=3]She is sleeping at her own bed.[/size]

[color=#ffff00][b]NOTE[/b]: If Anoriath alive, you need V1.1
Use v1.0 if Anoriath dead.[/color]
[b]
[color=#00ffff][size=4]Lilija and Anoriath can work together with V1.1[/size][/color][/b][size=4]
[/size]
[size=3]She is only a merchant, not a follower.[/size]
[size=3]She is essential and unmarried.[/size]
[size=3]Race: Nord[/size]
[size=3]Weight: 10[/size]
[size=3]Height: 0.95[/size]
[size=3]Voice type: Female young eager[/size]
[size=3]Hair color: Bright blond[/size]
[size=3]Her eyes light grey[/size]
[size=3]She wears Hunter Outfit[/size]

[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]Mod used on screenshots[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41443]Dream Girl[/url] by Petrovich
I prefer this skin. You can use what do you want of course.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] byÂ HHaleyy

[/size][b][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21386819?tab=user+files]MY MODS[/url][/size][/b]
author: cengo
